column2: "Na Agrippa see Paul dɛ
column3: Wɔama wo kwan dɛ ka w’asɛm. Nna Paul tseen ne nsa yii n’ano dɛ:"

column2: "Muhu no dɛ me tsir ayɛ yie
column3: Ɔhen Agrippa
column4: dɛ miribeyi m’ano wɔ w’enyim ndɛ
column5: wɔ nsɛm nyina a Jewfo dze roto mo do no ho;"

column2: "na ne tsitsir nye dɛ ɔwo dze awea amambra nye ekyingyesɛm a ɔwɔ Jewfo mu nyina ho: dɛm ntsi meserɛ wo dɛ to wo bo tsie me."
"M’asetsena fitsi mo mbofraber mu a ɔhyɛɛ ase wɔ mankasa me man mu
column3: nye Jerusalɛm no

column2: "na wonyim me fi ahyɛse
column3: na sɛ wɔpɛ dɛ wodzi ho dase a
column4: wonyim dɛ moforaa fɛkuw a wotua hɛn som no ho no mu
column5: na mobɔɔ me bra dɛ Farisiinyi."

column2: "Na afei migyina ha na worubu me atsɛn wɔ anohoba a Nyankopɔn dze maa egyanom no ho enyidado ntsi yi:"
"ɔno na hɛn mbusuakuw duebien no som enyiberdo adzesaa nye adzekyee
column3: dze hɔn enyi to do dɛ wobenya. Na enyidado yi ho ntsi
column5: nna Jewfo rotoatoa m’ano yi o."

column2: "Ɔyɛ dɛn na hom bu iyi asɛm a wɔnngye nndzi
column3: dɛ Nyankopɔn nyan ewufo?"

column2: "Na ampaara mankasa so modween moho dɛ ɔsɛ me dɛ mebɛyɛ ndzɛmba pii metsia Jesus Nazarɛtnyi no ne dzin."
"Na iyi so na meyɛe wɔ Jerusalɛm: minyaa asɔfompanyin no hɔ tum no
column3: medze ahotseweefo no pii guu efiadze

column2: "Na motɔɔ dɛ metsea hɔn wɔ nhyiamudan nyina mu
column3: na mehyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnka ebususɛm; na mobɔɔ hɔn do dam koraa no metaa hɔn do kɔr ananaben nkurow do."

column2: "Ɔno mu na menam rokɔ Damaskɔs na medze asɔfompanyin hɔn tum nye ho kwan no
column6: muhun kwan no do kan bi a ofi sor a ɔkyɛn ewia ne hyerɛn
column7: dɛ oebotwa emi nye hɔn a wɔnye me nam no ho ehyia."

column2: "Na hɛn nyina hwehwee daadze no
column3: metsee ndze bi a ɔrekasa kyerɛ me wɔ Hebriw kasa mu dɛ
column6: ɔyɛ dɛn na etaa mo do yi? Ɔyɛ dzen ma wo dɛ ebɔwɔ dadzepoma ano ntsia."

column2: "Na mesee dɛ
column3: Woana nye wo
column5: Emi nye Jesus a etaa no do no."

column2: "Na soɛr gyina w’anan do: na iyi ntsi na meyi moho akyerɛ wo
column3: dɛ mibeyi wo ato hɔ dɛ ndzɛmba a ehu yi nye dza miribeyi moho akyerɛ wo wɔ mu no ho somfo nye dasefo;"

column2: "na mibeyi wo wɔ ɔman no nye amanaman a morosoma wo wɔ hɔn hɔ no nsamu
column4: "dɛ kobue hɔn enyi na kɛdan hɔn fi sum mu bra kan mu
column5: ma woeefi Satan tum mu aba Nyankopɔn hɔ
column6: na woeenya bɔnfakyɛ nye egyapadze wɔ hɔn a wɔnam gyedzi a ɔwɔ mo mu do enya ahotsewee no mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi
column3: Ɔhen Agrippa
column4: mannyɛ enyido adzehu a ofi sor no ho asoɔdzen:"

column2: "na midzii kan kyerɛɛ hɔn a wɔwɔ Damaskɔs
column3: nye hɔn a wɔwɔ Jerusalɛm so
column6: dɛ wonnu hɔnho na wɔnsan mbra Nyankopɔn hɔ
column7: na wɔnyɛ ndwuma a ɔfata nnuho."

column2: "Iyi ntsi na Jewfo no bɛkyeer me wɔ asɔrfi mu
column3: hwehwɛɛ dɛ woku me."

column2: "Na dɛ minyaa Nyankopɔn hɔ mboa ntsi
column3: na migyina hɔ dze ebodu ndɛ
column4: na midzi dase kyerɛ akɛse nye nkakraba nyina
column5: na mennka asɛm biara gyedɛ dza nkɔnhyɛfo nye Moses nyina kaa dɛ ɔbɛba mu no nkotsee;"

column2: "mbrɛ otwar dɛ Kraest bohu amandze
column3: na oedzi kan nam ewufosoɛr mu aka kan ho asɛm akyerɛ ɔman no nye amanamamfo."

column2: "Na oyii n’ano dɛm no
column3: Festus dze ndze kɛse tseaa mu dɛ
column5: egyim: nwomasua dodow robɔ wo dam."

column2: "Na Paul see dɛ
column3: Mommbɔɔ dam bi
column5: na meka nokwar nye enyidahɔ nsɛm."

column2: "Na ɔhen a medze ndam kasa kyerɛ no yi nyim nsɛm yi mu: na megye dzi dɛ iyinom mu biara nnsuma no; na wɔannyɛ yi wɔ kukua mu."
"Ɔhen Agrippa
column3: egye nkɔnhyɛfo no dzi anaa? Minyim dɛ egye dzi."

column2: "Na Agrippa see Paul dɛ
column3: Ana edwen dɛ ber kakraabi yi ibotum ama maayɛ Kristiannyi?"

column2: "Na Paul see dɛ
column3: Mepɛ wɔ Nyankopɔn mu dɛ
column7: na hɔn a woritsie me ndɛ nyina aayɛ dɛ mara

column2: "Na ɔhen no
column3: nye ambrado no
column5: nye hɔn a wɔnye hɔn tse hɔ no soɛree;"

column2: "na wɔkɔr nkyɛn beebi no
column3: wɔkae wɔ hɔn mu dɛ
column4: Nyimpa yi nnyɛɛ biribi a ɔsɛ owu anaadɛ nkyehoma."

column2: "Na Agrippa see Festus dɛ
column3: Sɛ nyimpa yi ammfa n’asɛm annkɛdan Kaesar a
